action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

Your goal for this game is to brew a potion following the potion recipe.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a bedroom now. There are a pillow, a bed, a potion recipe, a book and a wardrobe. The pillow is on the floor. The potion recipe is on the bed. The book is on the bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a reading room here.
action.label: context

action.content: You take the potion recipe. In your inventory you have a potion recipe.
action.label: context

action.content: You are in a reading room now. There are a couch, a chair, a side table, a table and a shelf. There are passages to a garden and a conservatory here.
action.label: context

action.content: You are in a conservatory now. There are a prickly pear and a planting table. The prickly pear is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
action.label: context

action.content: You take the prickly pear. In your inventory you have a potion recipe and a prickly pear.
action.label: context

action.content: You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a magic workshop, a broom closet, a bedroom and a reading room here.
action.label: context

action.content:
You are in a magic workshop now. There are a ice wand, a fire wand, a workbench, a fairy wand, a zulpowand and a orrery. The ice wand is on the ceiling. The fire wand is on the ceiling. The fairy wand is on the ceiling. The zulpowand is on the ceiling. There are passages to a bedroom and a kitchen here.
Magical experiments have reversed and dampened gravity in this room. You begin to float in the air.
action.label: context

action.content: Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
action.label: context

action.content:
You drop the prickly pear on the floor.
The prickly pear floats up to the ceiling.
action.label: context

action.content: You take the zulpowand. In your inventory you have a potion recipe and a zulpowand.
action.label: context

action.content:
You are in a kitchen now. There are a plate, a cupboard, a cauldron and a counter. The plate is on the floor. The cupboard is closed. The cauldron is on the floor. There are passages to a conservatory and a pantry here.
Gravity behaves normally in this room. You stop floating in the air.
action.label: context

action.content: You put the zulpowand in the cauldron.
action.label: context

action.content: You are in a pantry now. There are a orange, a eye of newt, a banana, a toad, a apple, a peach, a sandwich, a ingredient rack and a ice box. The orange is in the ice box. The eye of newt is on the floor. The banana is in the ice box. The toad is in the ice box. The apple is in the ice box. The peach is in the ice box. The sandwich is in the ice box. The ice box is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
action.label: context

action.content: You take the eye of newt. In your inventory you have a potion recipe and a eye of newt.
action.label: context

action.content: You are in a kitchen now. There are a zulpowand, a plate, a cupboard, a cauldron and a counter. The zulpowand is in the cauldron. The plate is on the floor. The cupboard is closed. The cauldron is on the floor. There are passages to a conservatory and a pantry here.
action.label: context

action.content: > put eye of newt in cauldron
action.label: response

action.content: You put the eye of newt in the cauldron.
action.label: context

action.content: Model produced DONE action at turn 16, end episode.
